nodes.text: Fo Kuna was a male Anx who served as an aide to Senator Zo Howler in the Galactic Senate during the waning years of the Republic.

During the Separatist Crisis, both Kuna and Howler were of the Anx species that represented Gravlex Med in the Galactic Senate. In 22 BBY, Kuna served under Howler, and after the retirement of Senator Horox Ryyder, the former Senator personally named Howler and Kuna his successors. Kuna and Howler both attended Ryyder's farewell ceremony at Ozlyn Gox during the start of the Clone Wars.
